price: (84) And grant me a mention [i.e., reputation] of honor among later generations.
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
